meanings.definition: To make five times as great.
meanings.sent1: She decided to quintuplicate the number of cupcakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to quintuplicate its profits by the end of the year.
meanings.sent3: Trying to quintuplicate the amount of homework in one night would be impossible!
meanings.sent4: His excitement seemed to quintuplicate with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick was to quintuplicate the number of flowers in the vase.

meanings.sent1: The store offered a quintuplicate of colorful pens in a pack.
meanings.sent2: She received a quintuplicate of keys to the different rooms in the hotel.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplicate of puppies running around the yard was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The team won a quintuplicate of trophies at the championship.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a quintuplicate of trees in the landscape.
